gov.lanl.adore.djatoka
Class DjatokaDecodeParam

java.lang.Object
  gov.lanl.adore.djatoka.DjatokaDecodeParam
All Implemented Interfaces:
DjatokaConstants
public class DjatokaDecodeParam
extends java.lang.Object
implements DjatokaConstants

Decode Parameters for djatoka extraction. Defines extraction parameters (i.e. region, rotate, level, transform plug-in) to be performed during extraction of JP2.

Author:
Ryan Chute

getScalingFactor

public double getScalingFactor()
Gets a positive scaling factor (e.g. 0.85643), where 1.0 is the current size. Value must be greater than 0 and less than 2.

Returns:
a positive scaling factor

setScalingFactor

public void setScalingFactor(double scalingFactor)
Sets a positive scaling factor (e.g. 0.85643), where 1.0 is the current size. Value must be greater than 0 and less than 2.

Parameters:
scalingFactor - a positive scaling factor to be applied

getScalingDimensions

public int[] getScalingDimensions()
Gets the ScalingDimensions to be applied; w,h.

Returns:
null if no scaling is to be performed or an int[] with length of 2 containing w,h values

setScalingDimensions

public void setScalingDimensions(int[] scalingDims)
Sets the ScalingDimensions to be applied; w,h.

Parameters:
scalingDims - int[] with length of 2 containing w,h values. Use value of 0 to maintain aspect ratio and calculate second value.
